### Kicking Horse Ave Renovations, Yoho National Park
#### Tender Number: 5P468-23-0250/A

**Renovation Details:**
We are seeking a qualified contractor to undertake exterior renovations on two residential houses and a garage in Field, BC, and interior renovations on a third residence in the same location. The exterior renovations involve removing and replacing the exterior siding and insulation on two buildings with an approximate footprint of 2000 square feet. The interior renovation includes renovating one bathroom and one kitchen, as well as installing a new bathroom.

**Scope and Requirements:**

- The contractor must have experience in performing similar renovations.
- The estimated value of the project is between $250,001 and $500,000, exclusive of taxes.
- The project involves performing the required work no later than March 8, 2024.
- The contractor is responsible for ensuring compliance with National Parks Regulations and the National Park Act.

**Submission Requirements:**
Submissions must be made in accordance with the two-submission procedure outlined in Section IB06 of the Special Instructions to Bidders.

- Bids may be submitted via email to soumissionsami-bidsrpc@pc.gc.ca.
- Bids will be accepted in English and French.

**Important:**

- Bidders must obtain the tender documents from the Government Electronic Tendering Service through the Government of Canada tendering service at www.canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities.
- Late submissions will not be considered.
- Bidders should ensure they are aware of the file size limit for attachments, which is 15 megabytes.

**Inquiries:**

All technical and contractual inquiries regarding this solicitation must be submitted in writing and must be received no later than five business days prior to the tender closing date.

**Clarification:**
This tender requires bidders to have experience in performing exterior renovations on similar buildings and to have a proven track record of compliance with relevant regulations. Bidders must also have the necessary resources and personnel to complete the work within the specified timeframe.
